wikipedia_page.main: Reginald Cecil "Rex" Robinson (16 February 1926 – 13 April 2015) was a British actor.He appeared in three Doctor Who serials directed by Lennie Mayne: as Dr. Tyler in The Three Doctors, Gebek in The Monster of Peladon and Dr. Carter in The Hand of Fear. Other acting roles include Z-Cars, No Hiding Place, The Onedin Line, Within These Walls, Terry and June, The Professionals, Only Fools and Horses, Yes Minister, and the films A Nightingale Sang in Berkeley Square and Superman IV: The Quest for Peace, and a one-off appearance in Are You Being Served?.

response: * Rex Robinson ("The Sweet Smell of Success", as Military Customer)

* 36.  The Menacing Mazurka: Miller is a publicity agent to keep an eye on the (Moscow) Bassrai State Dancers visit to London. A dancer wants to defect but Miller is suspicious of her. The visit is being used to try and return a Colonel (George Pravda) who defected to Britain years earlier. Also features Olaf Pooley, Harry Towb and Rex Robinson.

Rex Robinson (born March 17, 1959) is a place kicker that played for the Marietta Blue Devils, University of Georgia Bulldogs of the Southeastern Conference and the New England PatriotsNFL profile of the National Football League.
